It supports rich, detailed descriptions for all types of collection objects and is designed for reuse across databases, portals, and the web. LIDO also enables multilingual access by allowing language attributes on descriptive elements."
Collection of terminologies (ontologies, authority files, classifications...) relevant to NFDI4Objects.

de: Geisteswissenschaftlichen Asset Management System am Institut für Digitale Geisteswissenschaften der Universität Graz

en: BERD@NFDI is a Central Resource for Unstructured Data Related to Business, Economics, and similar Social Sciences.

The ILC4CLARIN vocabulary platform provides tools for the collaborative maintenance, publication, and browsing of vocabularies and taxonomies. Based on the open-source Skosmos software and the SKOS data model, it supports structured concept views, hierarchy visualisation, search, and REST API access. The platform was developed for partners of the CLARIN-IT consortium and the H2IOSC project and contributes to the federated SSH Open Cluster.

"The TS4NFDI Federated Service is an advanced, dynamic solution designed to perform federated calls across multiple Terminology Services (TS) within NFDI. It is particularly tailored for environments where integration and aggregation of diverse data sources are essential. The service offers search capabilities, enabling users to refine search results based on specific criteria, and supports responses in both JSON and JSON-LD formats."
Vocabs.OpenEduHub.de is a vocabulary portal for educational metadata used by the OpenEduHub project
"The Bioregistry is an open source, community curated registry, meta-registry, and compact identifier resolver."

The Register of Historical and Object-Related Vocabularies and Authority Data (R:hovono) of the NFDI4Memory consortium provides an in-depth overview of vocabularies and authority data that are relevant to the historical research community. It brings together information that is otherwise scattered and increases the visibility, accessibility, and dissemination of these vocabularies within the context of the GND Agency for History, which is currently under development.

de: Register historischer und objektorientierter Vokabulare und Normdaten

en: The RDA Metadata Standards Catalog is a collaborative, open directory of metadata standards applicable to research data. It is offered to the international academic community to help address infrastructure challenges.

de: Die VZG Formatdatenbank dokumentiert verschiedene Datenformate, die sich in Strukturierungssprachen, Anwendungsformate, Kodierungen und Schemasprachen unterteilen lassen. Sie zeigt auf, wie jedes Format ein bestimmtes Datenmodell abbildet und welche Kodierungen (z. B. JSON-LD) dafür verwendet werden. Zudem berücksichtigt die Datenbank die zugehörigen Standards und Schemas, die eine formale Beschreibung der Formate ermöglichen. So unterstützt sie die Nutzung und Interoperabilität der Datenformate.

en: The Korea Knowledge Organization System (KOS) registry is developed by the K-KOS Meta-Information Project Group at Hansung University. In addition to KOS information, it provides access to related project proposals, research results, and other resources.
OntoPortal-Astro is an OntoPortal-based ontology and vocabulary repository for astronomy, heliophysics, planetary sciences, and particle physics.
SwateDB includes a collection of external ontologies relevant to plant data as well as the DataPLANT Biology Ontology (DPBO).

ELGA GmbH operates the Austrian eHealth Terminology Browser as a central platform for ELGA and eHealth terminologies. Required code systems, value sets, and concept maps are provided in a standardized format and free of charge to enable interoperable data exchange in Austria.

In addition to the SkoHub software suite, SkoHub also hosts “SkoHub Vocabularies”. This is a vocabulary registry that includes vocabularies such as the Hochschulfächersystematik. However, there is currently no comprehensive list of all available vocabularies.
